definition: to refine/refining (e.g. oil, chemicals etc)
to refine/to smelt
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
variant of 花[hua1]

sentences.english: The Party Committee of Fujian Oil Refine Company.
sentences.chinese: 中共福建煉化公司委員會。

sentences.english: Production strategy is how to reduce cost while refining.
sentences.chinese: 生產戰略主要研究如何在煉化過程中降低成本。

sentences.english: The blade of a gas turbine fractured and the unit stopped unnaturally in a refinery.
sentences.chinese: 某煉化廠煙氣輪機一動葉片斷裂引起停機事故。
